pros: I worked as a Summer Intern, 2019 at NVIDIA. My work was specifically targeted, where I worked with a team to containerize entire filesystems and deploy them wherever necessary. It was a great learning experience and helped my understanding of the medium to large corporation work culture.

title: I worked with NVIDIA for ~6 years and I found the campus and my co-workers to be some of the most kn
pros: I worked with NVIDIA for ~6 years and I found the campus and my co-workers to be some of the most knowledgeable people to work with. The issue seemed to be that the managers were overworked and unable to focus on the problem areas of day-to-day jobs, causing issues that just seemed to build up.
